text: The scientific name Allium montanum has been used for at least six different species of Allium. *Allium montanum Schrank – the only legitimate name, first used in 1785, now considered a synonym of Allium schoenoprasum subsp. schoenoprasum (chives) The following names are synonyms for other species: *Allium montanum F.W.Schmidt, nom. illeg. = Allium lusitanicum *Allium montanum Guss., nom. illeg. = Allium tenuiflorum *Allium montanum Rchb., nom. illeg. = Allium flavum subsp. flavum *Allium montanum Sm. , nom. illeg. = Allium sibthorpianum *Allium montanum Ten., nom. illeg. = Allium cupani subsp. cupani ==References== Category:Set indices on plants
title: Allium montanum
